amendment.description: An amendment numbered 85 printed in Part B of House Report 118-272 to prohibit funds by the Department of Health and Human Services to make voluntary contributions to the World Health Organization.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Biggs amendment (A036) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Biggs amendment (A036) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Biggs amendment (A036) Agreed to by voice vote.
